[[Seattle Seahawks]] }} '''Lester Williams''' (born January 19, 1959 in [[Miami, Florida]]) is a former [[American football]] [[defensive tackle]] in the [[National Football League]], mainly for the [[New England Patriots]]. Williams was an [[1981 College Football All-America Team|All-American]] at the University of Miami in 1981.
